frontmatter.title: Are You Indispensable?
frontmatter.short: You couldn't write this book ten years ago, because ten years ago, the economy wanted you to fit in. It took care of you . . . if you fit in.
frontmatter.keywords: business intelligence reporting, data driven decision making, data driven decisions, using data to make decisions
